course_description: This course is an introduction to R, a statistical computing program, and R Studio, the platform and programming interface for R. These tools, R and R Studio, are designed to help analysts work with data to perform a range of statistical analyses. This tool works side-by-side with Excel -- R can import data from Excel, clean and subdivide the data, and then export it back to Excel. This toolkit helps students get a jumpstart in working with R and introduces them to data visualization packages such as ggplot, ggthemes, and Stargazer.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the BBA program.
